To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private DragonflyDoji _dragonflydoji;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_dragonflydoji = DragonflyDoji(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_dragonflydoji.IsReady)
{
    var period = _dragonflydoji.Period.Value;
    var current = _dragonflydoji.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.dragonflydoji = self.DragonflyDoji(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.dragonflydoji.IsReady:
    period = self.dragonflydoji.Period.Value
    current = self.dragonflydoji.Current.Value
